extendedInfo.description: Test your reactions!Reply to more questions as possible in the shortest time possible! Challenge your friends on the same with the 2players offline mode and keep your records on the top of the single-playerâs rankings.Unlock the achievements to get credits and buy new questions and modes.The game is completely free, so what are you waiting for? Download it and start to play now!The game use the social platform Heyzap, we advise to install it for a complete game experience with leaderboards, achievements and more!How to play:-Select a language and a time from the option section.-Select the game mode (Single player is already unlocked. For the multiplayers modes you must to unlock them with credits).-Reply true or false to the questions.-Try not to make mistakes and get the highest score possible.-Play the singleplayer mode to unlock achievements and earn credits.-Use credits to unlock new questions and modes.Game features:-2 language available: English, Italian.-Possibility to choose the playing time (45s, 90s, 120s, 180s).-2 Available modes:  	Single player (already unlocked).  	2 players offline (unlock it by using the credits): Challenge your friends on your device!-More than 8 questions for each category.-7 Categories: 4 already available and 3 to unlock with credits (Other categories coming soon!).-4 Leaderboards, one for each playing time.-24 Achievements to unlock.Thanks for your attention and have fun!
